name: Grand Finale
description:
Grand Finale is a game jam game with the theme "The Last Night" hosted by TairaGames.

Grand Finale is a simple rhythm game (similar with O2Jam) sprinkled with a story.

Developed with Unity3D.

Credit goes to (Discord names):
- LaserFocus (Programmer)
- NotEnoughScience (Story Director)
- FUST (2D Artist)
- Tripolar (2D Artist)
